name: The Cruise (Everest Studios)
description:
Please note that this page is no longer updated. You can find more updated versions of the game in the original developers page here.

The Cruise is a game developed by Everest Studios. As a secondary project, after SCP: Infiltration. Originally presented to the studio by the programmer SwiftKraft. It received a lot of attention and support from the studio and community. There are big plans for the game coming in the future! 

What is The Cruise? Its your typical space alien shooter arcade game, if you were born in the 80's you probably know what we are talking about. 

Fight against the enemy ships, gain allies and fight different enemy bosses! A definitive stress killer. Get a free copy of the game here!
